spec:
add a hints.md file to the root which provides info and structure on how to add code/tests:

Backend:
Use modular approach with each unit of functionality in it's own module under backend/src/modules
API first approach with clean, consistent and well thought out API endpoints (each prefixed with /api) where requests and responses are JSON payloads and supporting pagination where appropriate.

Only need to add simple happy path e2e tests (no unit testing required)
commitMessage: Add hints.md with development guidelines for backend code and testing
